title: The Legrand Group Expands its Long Standing Relationship with Technomedia
text:
Adding Learning Management to its Existing Talent Management Platform to Complement Modules for Performance, Competency, Succession and Compensation
NEW YORK, NY and MONTREAL, QC – SEPTEMBER 03, 2015 - For almost 10 years, Technomedia , a leading provider of cloud-based, unified talent management solutions, has been working with the Legrand Group to optimize their HR processes. Based on the company’s proven success with the other Technomedia modules which have helped Legrand manage their HR initiatives across the organization, the company will be adding Technomedia’s Learning and Development module to its existing solution to better track the learning activities of its 36,000 employees worldwide.
Founded in 1865, Legrand is the global specialist in electrical and digital building infrastructures. Legrand operates in more than 80 countries and markets its products in more than 180 countries. They reported 2014 sales of 4.5 billion euros.
Once again, Legrand has selected Technomedia and its SaaS offerings to manage all HR processes including competency management, employee performance evaluations, succession planning and compensation management. Legrand will also benefit from the implementation of the Learning module within the next few months which will be customized to the workflows of their growing company’s needs.
“This is an important partnership for Technomedia,” says Alain Latry, President and CEO of Technomedia. “We are proud that the Legrand Group realizes the significant contributions our solutions play in meeting their current and future talent management needs, along with our team’s expertise in migrating and implementing new modules.”
This sentiment is shared by Marc Parouty, Talent and Group HR Processes Manager, at Legrand: “We strongly value the development of each of our employees. Technomedia’s Learning solution allows us to continue this policy, applying a consistent process, to optimize our HRIS investments across the company.”
ABOUT TECHNOMEDIA
Since 1996, Technomedia’s cloud-based talent management solutions and services have enabled global organizations to cultivate high-performing workforces. Hundreds of companies in more than 70 countries rely on Technomedia’s award-winning software suite for talent acquisition, performance management, succession planning, compensation management, core HR hub, and learning and development. Technomedia powers talent awareness, which drives HR insights that ensure business alignment and talent engagement. Connect with us: Website | Twitter | LinkedIn | Facebook .
